name: Joyride (itch) (X-Race)
description:
-----ABOUT THE GAME----

You are a biker on the run from the law take out other bikes and cars with oil slicks your trusty baton or by running them off the road in to trees. Make sure you avoid the innocent bystanders and potholes.

-----CONTROLS-----

Move with WASD or up, down, left right (once the game has started you will need to move to start playing)

You can bump cars and bikes off the road into trees for big points however each bump damages you a little bit.

Press 'A' (Z or Spacebar on a keyboard) to swing your baton to the side you last moved to. This will take out cars and bikes, cause you no damage but score you less points.

Press 'B' (X or Enter on a keyboard) to drop an oil slick behind you. This will take out cars and bikes, cause you no damage and score you the same as a baton strike.

Avoid pedestrians they hurt you badly and take away a chunk of your points.

Avoid potholes they hurt you a bit and take away some of your points.

Collect health drops when they appear to stay alive as long as you can.

Collect add time to extend the time of your game.
